<lj-cut text="Heres some shit I WROTE!"> ___________________________________________

2 storied up above the noise of crowds.
I am oblivious to this endless frivolous drought.
Hanging for your comfort; put aside for your reasons.
Looking down on this situation I wish I was leaving.
Nothing gone right except night to day, cut me loose to lose your spite parade.
Cover your eyes to see it your way.
Open your ears and ignore what I say.
It will all come out to play and run to another side.
That's when time has come to expose your true side.
I'm bound by your dilusion
Drowning in your solution
Taken back by your actions
10 miles from where it all started one verse ago.
All my expenses payed with good entensions on a reverb I owe.
I wount sit down with you cause I cant stand anymore of this.
3 times ago, 2 more to go, 1 foot in the grass of endlessness.
Take my hand and I'll show you where I am coming from.
If you don't show me now forever hold your tounge.
Hide yourself in a state of dispise.
When you see yourself in someonelse's eye's
I wount be so quick to release tid bits as I see them.
I wount be here to see them; I am going away from here.
_____________________________
 


Leaving the yard 
no where to go
no where to turn
seeing no one i know
bag in my hand
creep thorugh the dark
hope the damn dog don't bark
*running away
try to escape my past 
running away
stopping the pain at last
no one i know
will let me let go
running away
wake up see the day.*
feel the rain pouring down my back
my hair sticks to my neck
needles stab my heart
as i see my bro. and i
parted on our way to freedom.
we're spotted
400 miles from home
no one i know
is anywhere around
where's my boy
why can't i see him
where'd he go
i don't wanna know 
who turned me in
sitting in the car
watch the trees go by
wonder where i am
and when the pain will start again
why couldn't i go
why did i fail
why am i being put
back in a place of pain and hate
i miss the days when i was...walk in the door 
everyone is there
tears are streaming
down cheeks as i hear my name
all i can ask is where's my brother
they tell me he's gone
he's in jail trying to make bail
lemme go see my bro.
i wanna know that he's okay
after all those long hard days
home again 
everyones safe now
no more runnin' 
just talkin' and cryin'
livin' and dyin',tryin' to be myself

~*Dreams*~Touch your skin
Hold you tight 
Feel your heart race as we fall
Feel the pain 
Close your eyes
Open your mind as we crawl.


Its nothing that you havent seen its more or less a dream within a dream.
Is something wrong I cant complain its just an image written out in vein.
I feel the blood its dripping through another day I hate to deal with you.
I put the knife against the skin and I squeeze as the blade slides right in

Somethings wrong
Hide your thoughts
I wont bother anything
So confused
What is this
It feels so good burn or sting

Its something that I love to feel, sometime I wish that it could be for real.
Nothings wrong my scars will wear, as my heart will slowly start to tear. 
I wonder now if this is right,
I look around but never see your light.
I feel the blade its sinking down, I feel the blood and i begin to drown.

Shut my mind
Hide my pain
Cover up what keeps me sound
Hate is not
Taking me
I look for you all around

i fell this sickness                                                                                                                    Creep up my throat, feeling
My own lonliness
Hammer against my chest;
Taking over my thoughts.
The days are slow and grey
Each one fades into the other,
More and more they fade away.

It's hard to explain.

The frightened pain
That fills my stomach
When I think of the happiness
That I must cover myself with.
To stop the questions,
I hide beneath this mask
Needing to escape from their
Suffocating friendliness.

You wouldn't understand.

The short breaths that I
Squeeze from my throat
Wishing to choke
My mouth wanting to shout
Feeling this need
To open and let the words flood out
But instead I tighten it further,
Enclose myself inside my head.

It's hard.

Hard to put into words,
How lost I feel in this world.
